quote: When I looked upon the surface of the gently flowing water, each painting that I had burned upon joining the church rose from the waves. I tried to grab them, but they dissolved upon touch.
quote_letters: WHEN I LOOKED UPON THE SURFACE OF THE GENTLY FLOWING WATER EACH PAINTING THAT I HAD BURNED UPON JOINING THE CHURCH ROSE FROM THE WAVES I TRIED TO GRAB THEM BUT THEY DISSOLVED UPON TOUCH
